hooks.command: SWARM_LINK="$HOME/.claude-swarm"; if [ -n "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT:-}" ] && [ -d "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}" ]; then if [ -L "$SWARM_LINK" ]; then CURRENT=$(readlink "$SWARM_LINK" 2>/dev/null); [ "$CURRENT" != "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}" ] && ln -sfn "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}" "$SWARM_LINK"; elif [ ! -e "$SWARM_LINK" ]; then ln -sfn "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}" "$SWARM_LINK"; fi; fi
